name: Ancient Egypt Solitaire
description:
So, you think you're good at Solitaire? Well Try the new twist to traditional Solitaire with Ancient Pyramid Solitaire.

Eliminate the pyramid of cards by building from the deck or click next for the next card in the the deck.

Use the wildcard to help get to your goal....

Beat the clock for the best bonus, but watch the time and your deck, once its gone....its gone.

Challenge friends in the Game Center...

So, you think you know Solitaire? Come on try Ancient Pyramid Solitaire.....King Tut will be so proud.....
